results.short_desc: v2708 200 degrees f 1/2 in. k5.6 quick response pendant fire sprinkler white v2708 5.6 1/2 qr pdt 200 wh
results.long_desc: these model v27 standard spray sprinklers are designed to produce a hemispherical spray pattern for standard commercial applications. they are available with either standard or quick response bulbs. it is cast with a hex shaped wrench boss to allow easy tightening from many angles reducing assembly effort. this sprinkler is available in various temperature ratings and finishes to meet many design requirements. the recessed pendent should be utilized with a model v27 recessed escutcheon which provides up to 3/4 in. of adjustments.
results.product_attribute: {'Maximum Operating Pressure': '250 PSI', 'Application': 'Commercial', 'Connection Type': 'NPT x IGS', 'Material': 'Die Cast Brass', 'Product Type': 'Quick Response Sprinkler', 'Maximum Operating Temperature': '+200 deg F', 'Minimum Operating Pressure': '7 PSI', 'K-Factor': '5.6 imp gal', 'Orientation': 'Pendant', 'Selling Size': '1/2 in', 'Temperature Rating': '200 deg F', 'Color/Finish': 'White'}

results.short_desc: 6 in. grooved galvanized ductile iron rigid coupling style 005 005 6 galv coup
results.long_desc: firelock style 005 rigid coupling has a unique patented angle pad design which allows the housings to offset while clamping the grooves. by permitting the housings to slide on the angled bolt pads rigidity is obtained. support and hanging requirements correspond to nfpa 13 sprinkler systems. angle pad design permits assembly by removing one nut/bolt and swinging the housing over the gasket. this reduces components to handle during assembly. the vic plus system patented is dry clean and non toxic. it reduces assembly time substantially and eliminates the mess and chance of over lubrication.
